reviewDescription: The product is good enough. Sturdy, good volume, good sound... But the product quality is lower compared to competition. Also, sound is not as crisp and clear. reviewTitle: Best bluetooth speaker under 2000.. Good battery with crystal clear sound
reviewDescription: The Boat Stone 352 Pro is the latest entrant in the line-up of Boat's well-regarded portable Bluetooth speakers. Known for producing high-quality audio devices at an affordable price, Boat has equipped the Stone 352 Pro with a 14-watt output and a robust 3600mAh battery, promising crystal clear sound and extended playtime. This review will explore the design, build quality, sound performance, battery life, connectivity options, and overall value of this versatile speaker.Design and Build QualityThe Boat Stone 352 Pro features a rugged, outdoor-friendly design that is built to withstand harsh conditions. Its sturdy silicon casing and mesh grille not only provide durability but also a stylish look. The speaker is IPX5 rated, making it water-resistant and ideal for poolside parties or beach outings.Weighing in at a manageable size, the speaker is highly portable, allowing users to carry it easily in a backpack. The control buttons are strategically placed on the top, offering intuitive access to power, volume, and playback functions. The overall build quality is impressive, ensuring that the speaker can handle rough usage without any issues.Sound PerformanceThe Boat Stone 352 Pro delivers exceptional sound quality for its price range. With a powerful 14-watt output, the speaker produces clear and balanced sound across all frequencies. The audio is loud enough to fill a large room or outdoor space, making it suitable for various settings.The speaker excels in delivering deep bass, crisp mids, and clear highs, providing a well-rounded listening experience. Whether you're listening to bass-heavy tracks or acoustic songs, the Boat Stone 352 Pro handles them with ease. The sound remains distortion-free even at higher volumes, which is a significant advantage for those who enjoy loud music.Battery LifeOne of the standout features of the Boat Stone 352 Pro is its impressive battery life. Equipped with a 3600mAh battery, the speaker offers up to 10-12 hours of continuous playback on a single charge, depending on the volume level and type of audio being played. This extended battery life ensures that you can enjoy your music without frequent interruptions for charging.The speaker uses a Type-C charging port, which allows for faster and more efficient charging. It takes approximately 3-4 hours to fully charge the speaker, which is reasonable given its large battery capacity.Connectivity and Additional FeaturesThe Boat Stone 352 Pro comes with Bluetooth 5.0 technology, providing a stable and efficient connection with a range of up to 10 meters. Pairing the speaker with your device is quick and easy, and the connection remains stable without any dropouts.In addition to Bluetooth, the speaker supports AUX input, allowing users to connect devices via a 3.5mm audio cable. This feature is particularly useful for those who prefer a wired connection or have devices that do not support Bluetooth.One of the standout features of the Boat Stone 352 Pro is its True Wireless Stereo (TWS) functionality. This allows you to pair two Boat Stone 352 Pro speakers together for a stereo sound experience, enhancing the overall audio quality and providing a more immersive listening experience.Value for MoneyThe Boat Stone 352 Pro offers excellent value for money, combining high-quality sound, durability, and long battery life in a compact and portable package. Priced competitively, it stands out as a top contender in the budget Bluetooth speaker market. While it may not rival the audio performance of premium speakers, it certainly delivers more than expected for its price range.ConclusionThe Boat Stone 352 Pro is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a reliable and affordable Bluetooth speaker. Its rugged design, powerful 14-watt output, long-lasting 3600mAh battery, and additional features like TWS functionality make it a versatile speaker for various occasions. Whether you need a speaker for outdoor adventures, poolside parties, or simply for home use, the Boat Stone 352 Pro is worth considering. With its blend of performance, durability, and affordability, it is a commendable option in the crowded Bluetooth speaker market.
Good speaker loud sound good enough for a room and jamming, but missing clarity or deep bass in sound. Good battery and connectivity. Weight is ambient, functionality is nice works properly.

I absolutely love this speaker! While I'm not a music expert who can delve into details about bass or sound quality, I truly enjoy listening to pure music in its original form. After using an Amazon Basics 3W Bluetooth speaker for a few years, I was pleasantly surprised by the 14W output of this new speaker. It's impressively loud, and the sound quality is clear and enjoyable.The speaker also comes with a convenient carrying strap, making it easy to take with you anywhere. I haven't had the chance to test the advertised 12 hours of battery life yet, but I'm looking forward to giving it a try in the coming days. Overall, I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for great sound on the go!
The biggest drawback is that it doesn't show the battery status anywhere be it on app or elsewhere. You only get to know when its almost exhausted.
